product_name: Rossignol T4 NIS Auto Touring Cross-Country Bindings
long_description: Rossignol T4 NIS Auto touring cross-country bindings easily click into the premounted NIS binding plates on your Nordic skis-no drilling required. Bindings easily adjust to 5 different positions within a 2.5cm range to accommodate a variety of skiing styles and snow conditions. Bindings install quickly and easily onto premounted plates that are included with NIS-system skis (sold separately). Other than the included NIS key, no additional tools are needed for mounting adjustments. Auto step-in design is simple to get into; release your boot from the binding with a poke of your pole. Bindings fit boots with NNN racing/touring soles; bindings do not accommodate NNN BC soles. Includes instruction manual. .
